page.title: 15TONY'S TEA BAR
page.content: A well known land mark in Wood Green is the{Tea Bar}on the west side of Ducketts Common. The Tea Bar is owned by a gentleman called Tony. He has owned the Tea Bar for seven years. He sells coffee, tea, sandwiches and rolls. Some of his{customers}are from well know television programmes. Tony likes working there because the people make him laugh and he has made many friends among his regular customers. {The van}in which Tony works is 90 years old. It was originally a Horse drawn carriage. It still has wheels but they have sunk into the ground. Before the war the van was in the Middle of the road close to Turnpike Lane Station, but it was moved to be closer to the nearby air raid shelter. He has no partners but each day Tony has his dog called Jason to keep him company.
